channel.title: Slot Machine :)
channel.description:
[size=14pt]Some credits go to "Dharokist" on R-S for the idea 100% Coded by me (interface & server sided)[/size]
The file in source for all the code = 7.8Kb
Most of the Features : -3 Modes : Easy, Medium, Hard -On easy the letters can be "A" "B" or "C" -On medium the letters can be "A" "B" "C" or "D" -On hard the letters can be "A" "B" "C" "D" or "E" -The modes make it so there's more combinations on the slot machine. Hard has the highest reward. -Maximum bet is 100M -No Dupes -No Glitches -If the amount you won was over 1B, you get a 1b ticket + the rest of the cash (so if somebody wins a 1b bet and they had 2b cash in their inventory, they wouldn't lose money) -Lists all the possible combinations of letters that will let you win (on the side of the screen - updates whenever you change the difficulty) -Buttons to bet more, if you try to bet more money than you have, the bet goes back down to zero.
What i'm going to do next: -The interface looks a bit messy, going to clean it up and make it look less crowded. -Make the interface sprites more fancy
[size=18pt]VIDEO OF SLOT MACHINE IN ACTION[/size] [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FE7ZiY-1d6U[/youtube]
[size=14pt]Post below what you think/suggestions for it, and what you would like to see me make next :)[/size]

item.description:

Limits:

One thing that turns me away from a server is colorful interfaces and the like. Keep it looking like vanilla RuneScape because anything other than that and it turns into MLP.

what the fudge is wrong with MLP???

item.title: Slot Machine :)
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Limits, post:9, topic:548107”][quote author=ReaperXScape link=topic=667011.msg4460345#msg4460345 date=1417246218]
looks even more ugly with no color
[/quote]
It looks professional with no color. Your current interface looks like it is targeted toward 6 year olds who still have frosting and pizza sauce slathered on the side of their face.[/quote]
Have you ever seen a slot machine?

Look at all those fuckin colors and bells n whistles. This shit ain’t targeted to a kid, kids can’t even play the slot machine…

Slot machines are colorful-ish. They also are colorful and light up win you win because it makes you feel good so you’ll go ahead and dump all the money you just won right back into the machine.

Read full topic

item.title: Slot Machine :)
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

And as I said on skype, it’s way too easy to win right now and your players will get too much money.
Games like this should be a “money sink”. They should take more than they give.
Hence why I said the combinations I did on skype.

AAA - Win
BBB - Win
CCC - Win
DDD - Win (D is a wildcard)
DAA - Win
DBB - Win
DCC - Win

Anything else is a loss. (Unless you obviously get like CDC or w/e).

And I’d really like to see this code, because you’re making it out to be like this is some huge project…

Read full topic

item.title: Slot Machine :)
item.dc:creator: @ReaperXScape ReaperXScape
item.description:
@ReaperXScape wrote:

well I coded it as short as I could, I now realize i could’ve taken a few shortcuts to reduce the code used but even with 7.8kb it still works fine.
the file has 330 lines of code, that might make it seem less lol

anyways, any suggestions on how to make the interface a bit less messy?

Read full topic

i personally feel that 7.8kb is way too much for something as minuscule as this.

nonetheless, congrats on the work. and yes, i also agree the interface looks a tad bit horrendous.

item.title: Slot Machine :)
item.dc:creator: @ReaperXScape ReaperXScape
item.description:
@ReaperXScape wrote:

[size=14pt]Some credits go to “Dharokist” on R-S for the idea
100% Coded by me (interface & server sided)[/size]

The file in source for all the code = 7.8Kb

Most of the Features :
-3 Modes : Easy, Medium, Hard
-On easy the letters can be “A” “B” or “C”
-On medium the letters can be “A” “B” “C” or “D”
-On hard the letters can be “A” “B” “C” “D” or “E”
-The modes make it so there’s more combinations on the slot machine. Hard has the highest reward.
-Maximum bet is 100M
-No Dupes
-No Glitches
-If the amount you won was over 1B, you get a 1b ticket + the rest of the cash (so if somebody wins a 1b bet and they had 2b cash in their inventory, they wouldn’t lose money)
-Lists all the possible combinations of letters that will let you win (on the side of the screen - updates whenever you change the difficulty)
-Buttons to bet more, if you try to bet more money than you have, the bet goes back down to zero.

What i’m going to do next:
-The interface looks a bit messy, going to clean it up and make it look less crowded.
-Make the interface sprites more fancy

[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FE7ZiY-1d6U[/youtube]
